text: Ra niscaya nai hamile lukamana (alaihis'salama) la'i kausala pradana gareka thiyaum, ki timile allahaprati krtajnata darsa'u, ra jasale krtajnata prakata gardacha, tyo aphno bhaloko lagi nai gardacha. Ra jasale krtajnata dekha'umdaina u janirakhos ki allaha vastavama nisprha ra prasansaniya cha
